body:
Comment 1: 
This is just godoc's usual behaviorâ€”as these functions return an int, they are
considered "constructor functions" for the int type. The rule works for most packages,
but builtin is special. Probably we should special-case this.

For an example of this rule working correctly, see NewEncoding here:
http://golang.org/pkg/encoding/base64/#Encoding
_Labels changed: added **priority-soon**, **go1.2**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Owner changed to @adg._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
